original: 五原郡人，呂布之女。正史中並無其名，亦無甚記載，只知其原本許配給袁術之子。在野史與後世各類作品中有較多著墨。
text: Wuyuan County, daughter of Lu Bu. There is no name or record in the official history, except that he was originally betrothed to Yuan Shu's son. There are more inscriptions in various works of wild history and later generations.
